Rockville.WMAL (AM): WMAL (630 kHz) — branded 105.9 FM & AM 630 WMAL — is a commercial AM news/talk radio station licensed to Washington, D.C. and serving the Washington metro area. It operates with 10,000 watts in the daytime and 5,000 watts in the nighttime with studios in Northwest Washington and its transmitter is located in Germantown, Maryland. All programming is simulcast on co-owned WMAL-FM at 105.9 MHz.
